website_summaries.verdict: Includes 4 full-size and 14 needle files that deliver all-round versatility on multiple materials.
pros: Durable high carbon steel file set offers a good range for DIY and professional use on wood and metals
They come in a nice zippered case and are covered by a 100% manufacturer's warranty
cons: More than some want to spend on a set, but still good value

customer_reviews.title: Pretty handy file set
customer_reviews.text: This set seems to have enough different types of files to handle most needs that would come up for general home repair. Not sure how long they will last, but they work fine for occasional usage, which is what I bought them for. "Wooden handle" refers to the file card brush, not the files themselves which have plastic handles that work fine. It can be a little difficult to get the files back into the tight elastic holders in the case, but not big deal. As a bonus, the English used in the description is hilarious. My two favorite phrases are "small files shouldn't lick soft metal" and "inevitable that there will be a backlog of collision during transportation".
customer_reviews.author: Danschy

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This set is so much nicer than I had expected. They literally thought of everything. The quality and craftsmanship is far beyond what I had expected in this set. The rubber handles make them comfortable and easy to grip. The files themselves are strong and durable with some weight to them but not enough to effect the performance of the tools The carrying case is a perfect way to keep them protected and nothing gets lost. The zipper on the case is a little hard to get started once it is opened all of the way but other than that this is a great set of files.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Extreme value for the price. They feel great using them and the case is awesome. I'll update if longer-term use shows quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: MattsViews

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my gift to my son who likes to do some woodwork. He made a wand out of it, and the tools helped him polish it. He decided to use it as a Halloween prop. The kit for this product is complete. We are satisfied with it.Like this set. It is really good value for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the money. I only do light filling, but am impressed with the set so far. Plenty of sizes and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Daddy like
customer_reviews.text: Really good all around file set for the crafty type person.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Must have for woodworking and metalworking 😀
customer_reviews.text: While I do use this for metalworking I've been using this for woodworking since there are times I cannot use my orbital sander or other sanding paper when the space is very confined. The quality of the product seems very good considering the price and has a non-slip handle and so far I have not seen the surface where down or break apart unlike some of the other cheaper files I've had in the past. Definitely recommending this product as another quality tools to have in hand for anyone that do crafting of any type whether it's wood, metal, or general maintenance 👍
customer_reviews.author: AkiTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but a good deal
customer_reviews.text: I like the tools. There are several and many sizes although some seem to be a little repetitive, I mean there’s not too much difference to justify another tool while I was needing one file that was sharper on one edge. I use them to finish my 3D printed parts among other uses. The case is not very practical. Just a few times taking the tool out and placing it back and signs of wear started appearing. It would’ve been better to have an injection molded plastic box with slots where the tool fits. Longer lasting and better organization option.
customer_reviews.author: Vier

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality files, nice case, good value for the money. I am happy with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marcus Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable files
customer_reviews.text: I bought this file set for my husband a few months ago and he recently started using it as we have been remodeling our house. It has been great for filing the corners of the steal metal trim in our new bathroom that he is tiling. He has also used it on wood including 2x4s to make things fit properly and more smooth. The tools are sturdy and do a good job whether you need a rough or smooth finish there are plenty of files.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Branske

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a technician for the auto industry, and I got the set for him. I thought that he would be able to use it at home for different projects, but he immediately said that he would be taking them to work and has gotten a lot of use out of them. He likes the handles and they are sturdy, some other brands after use the handles will come off or break, but not these ones. The case is a nice touch too so you can keep them all together. He is very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Two of the files are redundant to two other I already own, but that's not a problem. I will use these exclusively for woodworking; they are just right for that purpose. The others I'll save for the maintenance duties I encounter. I particularly find the round and small flats very useful and produce quality results on wood.
customer_reviews.author: John of WV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Files for any project
customer_reviews.text: We've been doing a lot of projects on the house and my husband has really got into woodworking. He was looking for an all-in-one file set that he could use for his projects. We found this and he was very happy that it included everything he was looking for. He's been using them for a week now and have been really pleased with the quality of the tools. They work great, have sturdy handles and come in a handy carrying case. It's perfect for the weekend woodworking warrior.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Among the many other options, these are legit
customer_reviews.text: High quality tools, great case and sturdy handles. For the price, tough to beat. There are a lot other options for file sets out there, many of them are your typical companies that also make things like kitchen sponges. Nothing against kitchen sponges, but Topec looks to be a true tool vendor which is why I decided to choose them over the other 14 options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aljure

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like that all the files are organized and in there own case instead of fumbling around looking for different size files in a toolbox drawer or bag. I have only used this product a few times so far but they pretty much meet the standard of any file and have held up good for my purposes so far. So overall I would recommend this if you're anything like me and organization is Paramount for you this is a very good kit.
customer_reviews.author: McPeak

customer_reviews.title: Great for small projects and 3d printing
customer_reviews.text: Nice file set. First, I expected it to be larger but these are mini files. The case has a zipper and a small wire brush. They are replacing my older files "pictured in orange". They are okay when comes to comfort but perfect for jewelry or fine work in plastics. I tested them out and a bar of steel and they cut well which mean it will work good for 3d printed objects.
customer_reviews.author: Mo kim

customer_reviews.title: They file as they are suppose to. The handle is just a privilege but a plus.
customer_reviews.text: My fathers has had the same files since I was a child. That is over 30 years ago. And his are top of the line. After using these I can see how well these are made and easy to use. I Have already used them to file metal (iron and aluminum) Amd they did very well. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this set, but it's too fragile
customer_reviews.text: This kit ticked all my boxes - a good case with files that seemed cut correctly (compared to other sets I bought) and a cleanup brush that works well. The big files work very well and are cut sharply. However, first time I used one of the small files it broke clean off, revealing that the files are not a solid mass of hardened steel.
customer_reviews.author: AnB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of files...
customer_reviews.text: if you are installing baseboard trim, you need this. Not all corners are perfect 90 degree angles. To prevent gaps in corner trim installs, coping is required. After coping, filing will need to be done to smooth it out. This file set has everything you need to do this and more. Overall quality is great and seems to be very sturdy. The case it comes with keeps it nicely organized.
customer_reviews.author: Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good value.
customer_reviews.text: You really cant go wrong buying this set. Its huge not like those tiny ones in Home depot, they also come in a nice bag as well
customer_reviews.author: duong tien minh

customer_reviews.title: adquate
customer_reviews.text: These work for my small crafting shop. I use them to file 3d printed parts, aluminum pieces and wood carvings. They work fine but two of the smaller files arrived bent and it seems they are not the strongest material and can easily bend. The larger files seem to be very solid.
customer_reviews.author: seabumb

customer_reviews.title: Light duty
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for light use, but don't try to use these on any harder metals at all. The half round just dissolved on a piece of annealed carbon steel after 10 minutes max. Also, the file card isn't a file card. More of a mini wire brush. Nevertheless, for the price they work well on light duty applications.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of files for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped in protective case that had an insert to prevent rubbing and contact among the files. Files are clearly mass-produced, but are of good quality and good materials. I have used on soft stone (catlinite), wood, and plastic and all have been easily dealt with with these files. I would buy again but hope that these last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David Bickford

customer_reviews.title: High quality set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of files. I an in an Auto Body shop and these guys all have to have their high dollar tools. they all love these and the variety of sizes. they cannot believe the quality that I got for the money. I will definitely buy from them again. Thank You for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Everlys

customer_reviews.title: Great file set
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the quality for the price. I use this kit for many different projects and haven't come across any flaws in the quality, also the carrying case is well made and very professional. I plan to purchase more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Harker

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice gift set!
customer_reviews.text: Great file set that is made of high quality and a comfortable rubber grip. I was happy that it came with a storage bag to help keep tools organized and easy to transport. This set should include every piece of filing edges that I would need for small wood projects.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Painters

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on a YouTube channel and thought it would be a nice set to have on hand nice complete that gives you plenty of options
customer_reviews.author: Jack Price

customer_reviews.title: Make works done !
customer_reviews.text: Receiving the product, it is indeed my accident, I thought it was a very small tool, seeing the real thing is much bigger than the imagination, much better than the imagination, the big point is small, the use is very big ,very good. Very satisfied. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This a great set for large and small projects. For the price alone makes this an excellent set for beginners getting into wood/metal hobbies. Personally, I use these on my knives and they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice metal file set
customer_reviews.text: So far this has held up from moderate use. Will file down wood but requires some elbow grease. Didn’t work at sanding ceramic.
customer_reviews.author: Milkman

customer_reviews.title: It is the file set I need.
customer_reviews.text: It is the file set I need. The case makes it easy to carry and storage. It worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: so***

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nice stuff, very functional, it can be used to polish any surface during homework
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wood working
customer_reviews.text: The variety sounded good, but none of them seem to work for wood, which was why i bought them for. I haven't used them for metal, so can’t comment to that.
customer_reviews.author: Massoud Vaziri

customer_reviews.title: cheap. A little too cheap to be any good.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Just know that when you order
customer_reviews.author: NDE-Tech

customer_reviews.title: Get a lot for your money and it matches my dewalt tools!
customer_reviews.text: Get a lot for your money and it matches my dewalt tools!
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: Multiple sizes and shaped files
customer_reviews.text: Had some minor issues that seller cleared up quickly. Big file set for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Mattpre

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These worked really good. I only used two of them so far, but they worked well and seemed to be very sturdy. I'll use the others soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tools. One very small negative. The fabric inside the case snags both removing and replacing tool.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Ridley

customer_reviews.title: very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the case is very strong and handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Theunissen

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Comes with a case wic which is great. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo by morning

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and heavy duty 18 prices is very good for the money is helpful for my wood working and kind of easy handy work
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not all files received.
customer_reviews.text: I just now realized my set was short 6 files. But today while working on a project one of my files snapped. Since the first day I opened up my set I never left any of the files out. I only received 11 files and the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K. Meiser

customer_reviews.title: Great file set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good file set, it is not a expensive set, Big ones are more helpful for jobs. Small ones are used for fine filing. They are better than the previous ones.All sorts of sizes and lengths and very sturdy handles!
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case, files fit very well in the case. The files work very well and are sharp. The files cut metal very well. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Assortment of Files
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They get the job efficiently and quickly, and the set contains enough options and sizes for any job I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Alexi Cooper

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry that it bent when I first used it. As long as I applied a little force, it broke into two pieces. I used it for several days and the handle fell off. Besides, I don't think it's very convenient to put it back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great tools. Come in a nice case and feel very solid and high end. Really great for the price. Would recommend to anyone interested in giving woodmaking a try.
customer_reviews.author: ACC

customer_reviews.title: Great files, very well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The handle is sturdy and keeps each file from slipping or twisting out regardless of what you're filing.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: We use some of these files for small chips in drinking glasses so we can keep using them safely. I am sure we will use for other things too. They came in a nice zippered case also
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Heffner

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set for the price -- which I see is even lower now than when I bought it. Has worked well for all of my applications (mostly metals and plastics, and occasionally wood).
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: nicely organized set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set of files with ergonomic handles. Perhaps a tougher steel wire brush would have been more appropriate than the brass brush included.
customer_reviews.author: L D A

customer_reviews.title: OK Quality
customer_reviews.text: Files are not very sharp. If they are for light use on soft materials they would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of files. I use them for my machining class and worked perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bousquet

customer_reviews.title: You do a great job
customer_reviews.text: I needed to files because of shortening some tools I have they look like they will do a great job
customer_reviews.author: Walter Hand

customer_reviews.title: Depression 。。。
customer_reviews.text: Bad sellers, garbage products, bad at first, refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with quality of the files. Packaged really well. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael todd Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This file is large and small, which is especially suitable for grinding some small spaces and is hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: amy

product_meta.title: Topec 18Pcs File Set, Swiss Pattern Files, Round and Flat File Kits are Made of High Carbon-Steel, Ideal Wooden Hand Tool for Woodwork, Metal, Model & Hobby Applications
feature_bullets: ★18 Pieces File Set -4 flat/triangle/half-round/round and 14 precise needle files. Ideal for cutting and polishing wood, metal, mirror, glass, ceramic tile, ceramic, leather and plastic.

★High-carbon Steel Tool - The carbon content of 0.75% is the optimum composition ratio of tools such as hoes/hammers. The fine-grained texture is deeply quenched and coated for long-lasting cutting and boring performance.

★Fine Molars and Tightly Connected Handles -Uniform pitch of teeth and fine textures can increase the grinding effect and save more effort. Use a fully wrapped connection process at the handle to prevent detachment during use.

★Multi-functional&Portable Family Essential Set - The bag is convenient for storage and carrying, and is very suitable for carpenters and DIY. It is perfect for daily use of metal grinding, wood boring, leather edging, hand-made and other use scenarios.

★Premium Service - If you have any problems during using our product. Contact our Professional after-service team via email. Topec Direct after-sale Team will get in touch with you and timely solve your problems.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars291 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
